casebody.data:
SIERRA CLUB and Louisiana Environmental Action Network, Inc. v. J. Dale GIVENS, in his official capacity as Secretary of the Louisiana Department of Environmental Quality, and the Louisiana Department of Environmental Quality. No. 97-CC-2661. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Jan. 9, 1998.

Prior report: La.App., — So.2d-.

In re Sierra Club; Louisiana Envir. Act. Network; — Plaintiff(s); applying for supervisory and/or remedial writ; Parish of East Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court, *1107Div. “J”, No. 428,844; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. CW97 0959.

Denied.

KNOLL, J., would grant the writ. TRAYLOR, J., not on panel.
